description:
Variation of conditions of approved permission 0140/20 (As amended by application 0140/20/01):  Approved Documents (Condition 5) ; Quantum of Floorspace (Condition 7); Plans and Documents (Condition 8); Energy Strategy (Condition 12); Construction Management and Logistics Plan (Condition 13); Demolition and Construction Environmental Management Plan (Condition 15); Housing Accommodation Schedule (Condition 16); Delivery and Service Management Plan, including Waste Management Plan (Condition 23); Detailed Delivery and Service Management Plan, including Waste Management Plan - School (Condition 24); Transport Strategy (Condition 29); Communal Spaces (Condition 47); Geoarchaeological Modelling (Condition 53); Archaeological Trench Evaluation and Excavation (Condition 54); Foundation and Below Ground Design (Condition 55); Presentation (Condition 56); Monitoring (Condition 57); Maximum Approved Land Use Quantums (Condition 99).

Removal of Conditions: School internal and external areas (Condition 49); School - acoustic design (Condition 50).  (summary)

The development is subject to an Environmental Impact Assessment (EIA) and includes an Environmental Statement Addendum.

[Conditions varied to reflect: Revised residential mix, to include Co-living Floorspace and Purpose-Built Student Accommodation; Minor increase in maximum approved building heights; Removal of primary school from Masterplan; Retention of Probation Centre; Reduced basement excavation; and Changes to provision of public open space, cycle parking, car parking, and on-site landscaping works.]
site_name: Development At Ilford Retail Park 261 To 275 And Probation Office 277 To 289
